mainFeatures.title: Explore and discover all the features that

feature1.title: Precise and Controlled Editing
feature1.description: Cut songs precisely by selecting the exact start and end. Use the buttons to adjust your final edit second by second

feature2.title: Volume and Format Adjustment
feature2.description: Increase or decrease the volume and convert files to popular formats like mp3, mp4, mkv and more. All with simple settings

feature3.title: Comparison and Dual Playback
feature3.description: Compare the original and edited version in real time with dual player mode. Check for edits before saving

footer.title: Let's go, give it a try

options.title: Resources
options.issues: Report Issues or Propose New Features
